SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT dp.dealerfile_processed_id, drw.dealer_reins_recon_wrk_id, drw.record_type, drw.reject_reason, drw.certificate, drw.reject_code, drw.reinsurance_reject_reason, drw.created_by, drw.created_date, drw.modified_by, drw.modified_date
FROM elp_dealer_reins_recon_wrk DRW inner join ELP_DEALERFILE_PROCESSED dp on dp.dealerfile_processed_id = drw.dealerfile_processed_id
WHERE drw.dealerfile_processed_id = :dealerfile_processed_id and (((:p_recordMode= 'REJ') and (reject_reason is not null) and (record_type != 'X')) or ((:p_recordMode is null) and (reject_reason is not null)) or ((:p_recordMode = 'LOD') and (REINSURANCE_LOADED = 'L')) or ((:p_recordMode = 'BYP') and (REINSURANCE_LOADED = 'N') and (Record_type='X')) or ((:p_recordMode = 'VAL') and (REINSURANCE_LOADED = 'V')) or ((:p_recordMode = 'REMREJ') and (record_type != 'X')))
SQL.LOAD_REJECT_LIST: SELECT certificate, record_type, reject_reason FROM elp_dealer_reins_recon_wrk WHERE dealerfile_processed_id = :dealerfile_processed_id AND reject_reason IS NOT NULL
